column5: Heading cross border this weekend... looking for a decent hotel w/ decent pricing.. any first hand recommendations?  G
If you tell me what area you will be visiting, I may be able to offer some recommendations.
Must be a strip joint somewhere for you to put in the night bud........
Unfortuantely those types of places in Buffalo are just topless, you have to go to Fort Erie to see the real deal.  Most of the strip clubs are located around the airport ...............

http://www.millenniumhotels.com/millennium...lery/index.html I've stayed in this hotel a few times. You are located in the parking lot of the Galleria mall, walk to the Dicks Sporting Good store. reasonable and safe.
You guys are asking for trouble from the (NF) police!  :o

Seriously, there a number of hotels around the airport area (Holiday Inn, Days Inn, Comfort Suites, Mariott).  If you are coming up with a siginificant other, try the Garden Place Hotel.  They have nice jacuzzi suites ........
